properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name for the database. This must be unique on the InfluxDB server.

properties.name: retention_policies
properties.description: (Optional) A list of retention policies for specified database
Each retention_policies supports the following:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the retention policy

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (Required) The duration for retention policy, format of duration can be found at InfluxDB Documentation.

properties.name: replication
properties.description: (Optional) Determines how many copies of data points are stored in a cluster. Not applicable for single node / Open Source version of InfluxDB. Default value of 1.

properties.name: shardgroupduration
properties.description: (Optional) Determines how much time each shard group spans. How and why to modify can be found at InfluxDB Documentation.

properties.name: default
properties.description: (Optional) Marks current retention policy as default. Default value is false.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name for the user.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Required) The password for the user.

properties.name: admin
properties.description: (Optional) Mark the user as admin.

properties.name: grant
properties.description: (Optional) A list of grants for non-admin users
Each grant supports the following:

properties.name: database
properties.description: (Required) The name of the database the privilege is associated with

properties.name: privilege
properties.description: (Required) The privilege to grant (READ|WRITE|ALL)
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name for the continuous_query. This must be unique on the InfluxDB server.

properties.name: database
properties.description: (Required) The database for the continuous_query. This must be an existing influxdb database.

properties.name: query
properties.description: (Required) The query for the continuous_query.
